title: 怎么样才可以获取末影龙头
author: qq2435805684
txt_content: 我需要来玩玩，别问用处

replies.author: 神王穿山者
replies.txt_content:
1.创造获得
2.找到末影船，里面某一个地方会出现龙头~

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
让苦力怕炸死末影龙啊
貌似只有创造模式获得……

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
表示原版没有模型为末影龙的头……
只有比较像的方形头
1.8才能得到，指令
/give @p skull 1 3 {display:{Name:"Enderdragon"},SkullOwner:{Id:"433562fa-9e23-443e-93b0-d67228435e77",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvNzRlY2MwNDA3ODVlNTQ2NjNlODU1ZWYwNDg2ZGE3MjE1NGQ2OWJiNGI3NDI0YjczODFjY2Y5NWIwOTVhIn19fQ=="}]}}}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 哦，对，1.9的创造模式物品栏里才有真正的末影龙头

replies.author: weiyv
replies.txt_content: 通过命令方块修改就行啦，网上有教程

replies.author: qq2435805684
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-31 20:04
1.9快照可以获得
又是你=-=大神
